system.description:
Whenever you move through the shadows, the god of ritual killing sends merit, flashing out in shadowy arms, striking all about you.
One of the many Gods of Fated Death is said to be the god/goddess Yamakala Lakibayibatara (Male-Female Deity). It is said that the God of Cyclical Death, Yamadiraja, and the Goddess of Vengeance, Kalakatri, were once one being of all death.

When you make Melee Attacks against enemies with Full HP, you may roll twice and take the better result.

When you make Melee Attacks against Staggered Enemies, once per your Fulmination, you can replace 1 Attack Tooth with a d12 Assassination Die. That die still Hits on 6+, and scores 2 Hits on 12+.

At Strike 4+, spend 2 Beats to kill all enemies who have 3 or less HP.
